body_html:
FYI : I was able to build the GPU pip package using the changes listed in this install script : https://github.com/noisychannel/tensorflow_install/blob/master/tf_install.sh

Specifically, check the function fix_tf which makes changes in third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL, tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl and tensorflow/stream_executor/BUILD.

body:
FYI : I was able to build the GPU pip package using the changes listed in this install script : https://github.com/noisychannel/tensorflow_install/blob/master/tf_install.sh

Specifically, check the function fix_tf which makes changes in third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL, tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl and tensorflow/stream_executor/BUILD.
